effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately. If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect. If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move’s damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately. If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect. If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move’s damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

short_effect.x_y: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

flavor_text.x_y: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
